I.ii.1.B.2.c
.
Jurisdiction of Concurrent EPs
EP 190 series are the jurisdiction of the Milwaukee and St. Paul PMCs.  When an EP 190 and 160 are pending concurrently, the EP 190 will be worked by the Milwaukee or St. Paul PMC and the EP 160 by the Philadelphia PMC.
Each PMC is expected to work their assigned claim to the next step in processing.  However, if completion of the EP 160 is required to take any action on the pending EP 190, the claims processor
will take all necessary actions possible
update the suspense date of the EP 190 for five days past the current suspense of the EP 160, and
add a Veterans Benefits Management System (VBMS) note that additional processing is deferred until the EP 160 is completed.
title: M21-1, Part I, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section B - Organization of the Pension Management Centers (PMCs)
citation: Part I, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section B
